definition: Sanders (name)/Bernie Sanders, United States Senator from Vermont and 2016 Presidential candidate
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: The story that Brandt and Sands tell, however, contains the reverse message.
sentences.chinese: 然而白若文和桑德斯所述的案例包含着相反的信息。

sentences.english: I wish Captain Sanders would hurry up with my shipment of wine.
sentences.chinese: 希望桑德斯船長能快把我訂的酒運來。

sentences.english: Clinton now has 2,202 delegates to Sanders' 1,400.
sentences.chinese: 桑德斯1400年克林頓現在有2202名代表。

sentences.english: "He's the Ferrari of dragons," Sanders says.
sentences.chinese: “它是龍中的法拉利，”桑德斯說。

sentences.english: "I just want to be able to help to another parent out there, " Sanders said.
sentences.chinese: 桑德斯說，我只想能夠幫助另一些父母走出那種困境。

sentences.english: Now Sanders wants to share her story in an effort to tear down the stigma of mental illness.
sentences.chinese: 現在桑德斯想分享她的故事以洗去精神疾病的陰影。

definition: Hillary (name)/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
